JobFullDesc: Company DescriptionServiceNow is making the world of work, work better for people. Our cloud‑based platform and solutions deliver digital workflows that create great experiences and unlock productivity for employees and the enterprise. We're growing fast, innovating faster, and making an impact on our customers' and employees' lives in significant and important ways. With over 6,900 customers, we serve approximately 80% of the Fortune 500, and we're on the 2020 list of FORTUNE World's Most Admired Companies.® We’re looking for people who are ready to jump right in and help us build on our incredible momentum, our diverse, engaged workforce, and our purpose to make the world of work, work better. Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.Job DescriptionWhat you get to do in this role:  Implement projects that support the marketing function Partner with individuals and teams across field marketing and campaigns to help improve pipeline generating campaigns (email nurtures, events, account-based marketing, webinars, etc.) and providing value-added analysis to support marketing decisions Work with product managers to identify new marketing opportunities, prepare regular marketing activity reports and respond to questions from the sales organization Manage and document our internal marketing systems, data quality, and new ideas. Be a liaison into Global Marketing Ops Establish a core set of training/implementation materials and videos to assist with onboarding and continued education for all Marketing systems and tools including our internal CRM system, self-service reporting, Tableau dashboards, and more Develop a set of on-demand reporting and processes to be used by field marketing for managing lead flow and follow up with internal sales teams Become a trusted expert on how our internal systems work and relate to one another to manage ad-hoc requests from a large and diverse group of individuals  QualificationsTo be successful in this role you have:  5+ years of marketing experience Experience in program management, lead generation or B2B Marketing, preferably with experience in Marketing or Sales Operations Ability to work in a metrics-driven environment, with basic understanding of marketing to sales funnel, business intelligence, and lead management processes and technologies A passion for data and analysis, with a curiosity to get to the root of a problem and solve it  FD21Additional InformationServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer.
